com.epoch.rgroups
Class RGroupDefs

java.lang.Object
  com.epoch.rgroups.RGroupDefs

public final class RGroupDefs
extends Object

Singleton class that holds names and definitions of shortcut groups that may substitute for generic R groups in Figure 1 of R-group questions. Scope: loaded by the GroupLoader servlet at the time of app deployment.

Field Summary
private static Map<String,String[]> allGroups
          Holds the group name (e.g., Ph) keying for the group SMILES definition and attachment point.

addGroup

public static void addGroup(String shortName,
                            String smiles,
                            String attachPoint)
                     throws GroupDefsException
Adds an R group to the list. This method is called by servlets/GroupLoader.java each time the code is recompiled; it does not need to be called from anywhere else.

Parameters:
shortName - name of R group (e.g., Ph)
smiles - SMILES definition of R group
attachPoint - attachment point of R group
Throws:
GroupDefsException - if any parameter is null or empty

print

public static void print()
Debug output.
